snippet.title: Potion Promise - Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
📢 Potion Promise V.1.03 Alpha Demo is Now Out on Itch.io 📢

"A 15-year-old witch named Alice must save her family's potion shop to restore their honor, despite her resentment toward her mother for abandoning them.
To clear the shop’s debts and revive the failing business, Alice is forced to gather resources in dangerous places and continue the potion-making legacy." 

Supported by IGDX Bootcamp 2024
